title: Man ranked queues
body:
I don't get what's happening with ranked queue times these days.
Whether I put down support as my first preference or second or neither, my queue times are like 5 minutes minimum.
In addition, the ranked champ select goes for around 6-8 minutes, but the problem is that so many people still forget to lock in or ban champs, leading into longer queue waiting time. 
Yesterday, because 6 people dodged straight for my ranked queue, I waited 18 minutes just in queue excluding the champ select time.
I used to queue up every minute or two, but it seems like I've got to wait much longer for some reason.
Back then I was gold 5, but now gold 1, on my way to promo, but I don't think 4 tiers would make such different with queue time.
Hmm, I wonder.
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: It's all about that elo. Not enough people in the elo so slow queue time  which shows that  Oce is trash {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
High gold/low plat elo is like around 1700 mmr and I'm pretty sure that's only like top 7,8% of oce. Surely not a small number of players to have like a 10 minute queue LOL haha
Well in that 7.3% of people at around 1700 MMR there is only 12810 players in that elo with 1% of them who actually chose support {{item:3070}}
